titles: Poor John or, a Lenten dish. Being the soliloquies of John Lambert now prisoner in the Tower of London.
author: Lambert, John, 1619-1683, attributed name.
publisher: Printed, for the benefit and edification of afflicted brethren,
notes: A satire, not in fact by John Lambert -- Cf. Wing.
Date and place of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
